Txt_Inn_Message_StartNight_M.Text:
*: Welcome to our inn, weary <IfSolo(traveller,travellers)>!
You must be exhausted at this late hour.

Txt_Inn_Message_TopNotRest_M.Text:
*: It's {VALUE} gold coins per night for a room.
Will you be staying?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Inn_Message_Top_M.Text: *: Will you be staying the night? Or perhaps simply stopping for a short rest? Either way, it's {VALUE} gold coins for a room.<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Inn_Message_Finish_M.Text:
*: Farewell, intrepid <IfSolo(traveller,travellers)>.
Come again any time.

Txt_Inn_Message_Cancel_M.Text: *: Oh, so you won't be staying with us? As you wish. Farewell!

Txt_Inn_Message_Shotage_M.Text: *: I'm terribly sorry, but you don't appear to have enough money.

Txt_Inn_Message_FinishHeal_M.Text:
*: Good morning!
I trust you had a restful sleep?
Do come again!

Txt_Inn_Message_FinishHealRest_M.Text: *: I trust you had a restful sleep? Do come again!
